featured.text: The roasting heat and high ______ made me feel hot and sticky, no matter what I did to cool off.

definition.zh_def: 烤，通常指用熱源加熱食物，特別是肉類，直到外表變得金黃色和酥脆。
definition.en_def: To cook food, especially meat, by exposing it to dry heat in an oven or over a fire.
definition.example: We decided to roast a chicken for dinner.
